name: Gravity Blast
description:
Bend the laws of physics just at your will and wipe out hordes of opponents with but a sweep of your hand. This is Gravity Blast and you are unstoppable !

Gravity Blast is a rail shooter game designed to be played on arcade.

The objective is simple : Just - Kill - Everything. You'll have two weapons to do so :
A main weapon that you can charge to be more powerful, and a mighty gravity orb that will incapacitate and damage most of your opponents.

This is a third year student prototype made in ETPA, Game Design School, with a group of seven game designers. We are working on it since october 2019 and the game is planned to be finished in June 2020. This is our biggest project so far and we hope you'll enjoy it.

Next update comes in March 2020 with brand new mechanics and graphics !
